title: CAG Invites Willingness from Empaneled CA Firms for Autonomous Body Audits (Update: Feb 27, 2026)
content:
# CAG Invites Willingness from Empaneled CA Firms for Autonomous Body Audits (Update: Feb 27, 2026)

Ek important update hai for our fellow Chartered Accountant firms! The Comptroller & Auditor General of India (CAG) ne ek fresh invitation announce kiya hai. This is for empaneled CA firms interested in auditing Autonomous and Other Bodies for the upcoming period.

Here are the key details:

*   **What:** The CAG is inviting Expression of Willingness (EoW) from CA firms to work with CAG Audit Teams for the audit of financial statements of Autonomous and other Bodies.
*   **Who is Eligible:** Only CA firms and LLPs already empaneled with the Office of the CAG for the year 2025-26, and having a minimum point score of 15, are eligible to submit their willingness.
*   **Period of Assignment:** The audit assignments will be for financial statements received during April 2026 to March 2027.
*   **Date of Uploading EoW:** The Expression of Willingness was uploaded on the CAG website on February 27, 2026.
*   **Last Date for Submission:** The last date and time to submit the willingness is **March 09, 2026, by 2:00 PM**.
*   **Communication:** For any queries, you can contact Vishal Chawre, Principal Director (AB), via email at abwing.cag@cag.gov.in.
